comment:
Extracted Variables:
1. x: Number of pop concerts
2. y: Number of R&B concerts

Definitions:
- x represents the decision variable for the number of pop concerts to be held.
- y represents the decision variable for the number of R&B concerts to be held.

Constraints:
1. 100x + 240y \geq 10000 (Minimum audience size constraint)
2. 2x + 4y \leq 180 (Maximum practice days constraint)
3. y \leq 0.4(x + y) (Maximum percentage of R&B concerts constraint)

Objective:
Minimize Z = x + y (Total number of concerts)
